videos.overview: A hate crime against a Muslim family results in the death of their daughter. When a crucial witness in the case is deported, Barba is forced to drop the charges against a suspect, and tensions rise between communities on opposing sides of the case.

videos.title: Sanctuary
videos.overview: The unexpected release of a suspect in a hate crime case leaves Benson and Barba caught between two families seeking justice for their loved ones. As public protests escalate to violence, Benson goes to desperate lengths to make an arrest.

videos.title: Gone Fishin'
videos.overview: When Fin crosses international borders to catch a fugitive rapist, a political tug-of-war derails Barba's legal case. Meanwhile, shocking allegations against Benson lead to the return of an old friend.

videos.title: Mood
videos.overview: The bizarre details of a woman's rape put the SVU at odds when Rollins and Carisi think her story is fabricated. Meanwhile, Benson goes on the offensive when her personal life is scrutinized.

videos.title: Contrapasso
videos.overview: When a man is found castrated and left for dead, Rollins and Carisi uncover three female suspects with possible motives. Meanwhile, Langan brings devastating news for Benson.

videos.title: No Good Reason
videos.overview: A teenager disappears after schoolmates make her the subject of a vicious cyberbullying attack.

videos.title: Complicated
videos.overview: A ten-year-old kidnapping case is reopened when a young woman is found wandering Central Park alone.

videos.title: Unintended Consequences
videos.overview: When a teenaged girl is found dead, Rollins goes undercover at a high-end rehab center where the victim was last seen alive. Meanwhile, Benson tries to overcome her doubts about Sheila.

videos.title: Something Happened
videos.overview: When an amnesic rape victim is found unconscious, Benson must unravel the facts about what happened. Her investigation drudges up the victim's dark secrets and reopens her own emotional wounds.

videos.title: Intent
videos.overview: When a social media celebrity is raped by an MMA champion, SVU connects the case to one of the stars' small-town fans; Benson and Sheila cooperate in caring for Noah.

videos.title: Gone Baby Gone
videos.overview: Emotions run high as the SVU squad embarks on a frantic search for Benson's missing son.

videos.title: Pathological
videos.overview: When the SVU investigates a case involving two students in a special needs school, Rollins discovers that one child's medical issues stem from a surprising source.

videos.title: Flight Risk
videos.overview: When an airline pilot accuses her captain of sexual assault, Barba convenes a Grand Jury to determine their employer's complicity in the crime. Meanwhile, Fin takes steps to ensure Benson is protected at work.

videos.title: Info Wars
videos.overview: After a female pundit is assaulted during a protest, Benson and Barba struggle to put their political beliefs aside in order to help bring the attacker to justice.

videos.title: The Undiscovered Country
videos.overview: When an infant goes missing, the SVU finds themselves taking sides in a family's right-to-die court case. Meanwhile, Barba's interference in the case puts the entire DA's office in jeopardy.

videos.title: Chasing Demons
videos.overview: A doctor arrested for sexually abusing his patients is set free after Cassidy's testimony causes a mistrial.

videos.title: In Loco Parentis
videos.overview: Carisi opens a police investigation when his niece reports a classmate for sexual assault, and Stone learns there are no perfect witnesses when it comes to sex crimes.

videos.title: Dare
videos.overview: A girl's tragic death becomes a criminal case when a surgeon harvests her organs without parental consent.

videos.title: Send in the Clowns
videos.overview: When a student disappears during a school trip to New York City, the cops race to find a mysterious masked man. Meanwhile, Fin and Stone both get visits from family.

videos.title: Service
videos.overview: The SVU must break through military red tape when a soldier is suspected of sexual assault.When a prostitute is beaten and raped, SVU looks inside the Army for the perpetrator; Benson must crack a tough witness who doesn't want to talk; and Rollins is vexed by SVU's efforts to help a "hooker."

videos.title: Sunk Cost Fallacy
videos.overview: The search for an abducted woman and her young daughter leads Lt. Benson to cross paths with an old friend. Meanwhile, Stone must make a tough decision on behalf of his sister.

videos.title: The Book of Esther
videos.overview: Rollins races to rescue a girl being held captive by her father.When an emaciated young girl is found huddled in a train bathroom quoting biblical passages, Rollins takes a special interest in her and takes it upon herself to uncover the truth about the girl's unsettling home life.

videos.title: Guardian
videos.overview: Fin investigates a man's claim that his sister was gang raped.

videos.title: Mama
videos.overview: An Alzheimer's patient claims she was raped, but her illness casts doubt on the case; Fin's sergeant orders come in.

videos.title: Remember Me
videos.overview: When a young woman takes a man hostage at gunpoint, Benson makes a dangerous attempt to defuse the situation. Meanwhile, the SVU discovers the shocking motive behind the abduction.

videos.title: Remember Me Too
videos.overview: Benson's suspicions about a kidnapping victim uncovers a dangerous criminal network prepared to silence anyone who gets in their way.

videos.title: Man Up
videos.overview: Teenager Sam Conway shows evidence of rape but refuses to name his attacker. Meanwhile, Benson and Rollins confess to some major life changes.

videos.title: Man Down
videos.overview: ADA Stone blames himself for the shocking verdict in Sam's case, and before Benson can offer help, Sam makes a tragic decision.

videos.title: Zero Tolerance
videos.overview: After the rescue of a young girl from a sex trafficker, Benson and Stone must take drastic measures to reunite her with her mother. Meanwhile, Rollins decides to give her rocky relationship another chance.

videos.title: Revenge
videos.overview: As a string of break-in assaults grows more violent, the cops investigate an online incel group to identify a suspect.

videos.title: Accredo
videos.overview: A member of a women's empowerment group is found murdered, leading the cops to the group's charismatic male leader. Meanwhile, Rollins keeps her pregnancy under wraps to avoid going on desk duty.

videos.title: Exile
videos.overview: A young woman wakes up in the hospital with no memory of her assault, and Carisi's investigation stalls when she disappears.

videos.title: Caretaker
videos.overview: The cops wrestle with an unthinkable crime when a family is murdered in their sleep.

videos.title: Hell's Kitchen
videos.overview: A waitress from a trendy New York restaurant is sexually assaulted at an after-hours VIP party.

videos.title: Mea Culpa
videos.overview: Stone takes his own case to trial when a woman from his past accuses him of sexual assault.

videos.title: Alta Kockers
videos.overview: The investigation into a promising new author's death leads to a decades-old secret kept between two reclusive brothers.

videos.title: Plastic
videos.overview: A woman accuses a celebrity plastic surgeon and his girlfriend of rape.

videos.title: Dear Ben
videos.overview: Stone takes up the unsolved cold case of a serial rapist that consumed his father's career.

videos.title: A Story of More Woe
videos.overview: Benson tries to help two teenage sisters after their father is killed. Meanwhile, Rollins goes into labor.

videos.title: Part 33
videos.overview: As Stone prosecutes the case of a woman who killed her abusive husband, Benson and her squad wrestle with the duty of testifying against her.

videos.title: Brothel
videos.overview: Fin teams up with an old colleague to track down the proprietor of a pop-up brothel.

videos.title: Facing Demons
videos.overview: A young man's suicide sparks a child molestation investigation, and Benson turns to Cassidy when the case hits a dead end.

videos.title: Missing
videos.overview: The SVU pursues a suspect when a child is discovered in the trunk of an abandoned car.

videos.title: Blackout
videos.overview: When Defense Attorney Nikki Staines is raped after a police charity event, Benson reluctantly looks to her own for a suspect.

videos.title: Dearly Beloved
videos.overview: The SVU investigates a he-said, she-said case when a woman crashes a wedding to accuse her therapist of sexual assault..

videos.title: The Good Girl
videos.overview: Benson works to uncover a pregnant teenager's secret when she refuses to name the baby's father.

videos.title: Exchange
videos.overview: Benson helps a teenaged exchange student after she's assaulted by a cab driver.

videos.title: Diss
videos.overview: When a pop star is assaulted in her home, the SVU investigates the public feud between her rapper husband and a competing recording artist. Meanwhile, Fin's family ties to a suspect takes him off the case.

videos.title: Assumptions
videos.overview: The SVU searches for two suspects spotted fleeing the scene after a Muslim woman is assaulted inside a synagogue. Meanwhile, Benson is dismayed to find Rob Miller out on bail.

videos.title: End Game
videos.overview: When a teenager is found dead in the Hudson River, Lt. Benson suspects Rob Miller is behind the mysterious death but can't prove it. Despite having only circumstantial evidence, ADA Stone takes the case to court before Miller can destroy more lives.

videos.title: I'm Going to Make You a Star
videos.overview: When an actress accuses a high-powered media mogul of attempted rape, Benson finds herself in a high-stakes game of cat and mouse. Changes in the squad room put Carisi between a rock and a hard place.

videos.title: The Darkest Journey Home
videos.overview: Benson works with a young woman to help her remember the details and suspects in her rape. In order to learn a new witness interview technique, Rollins and Fin have to experience it for themselves.

videos.title: Down Low in Hell's Kitchen
videos.overview: A serial predator targeting men in gay bars proves difficult to catch, until a celebrity comes forward with his story.

videos.title: The Burden of Our Choices
videos.overview: Rollins clashes with the parents of a teenaged runaway. The squad comes together for a special event.

videos.title: At Midnight in Manhattan
videos.overview: The detectives are spread thin when three major cases come in at Midnight. Rollins and Carisi argue over an arrest.

videos.title: Murdered at a Bad Address
videos.overview: The case of a teenage girl assaulted in the projects leads to a startling discovery. Benson puts her trust in someone from her past.

videos.title: Counselor, It's Chinatown
videos.overview: The SVU joins an undercover task force in busting a human trafficking ring.

videos.title: We Dream of Machine Elves
videos.overview: Rollins goes undercover to find a suspect who is drugging and assaulting tourists, while Benson helps the victims sort out their memories from their hallucinations.

videos.title: Can't Be Held Accountable
videos.overview: A fellow detective asks the SVU for help when he suspects his two daughters are being groomed by a serial predator. Kat disobeys the Captain's orders.
